content.detailedDescription: It was late eveing and there was a load noise coming from outside and everybody looking out of there windows it was a big helicopter circling around looking for something could not see the type of craft but i think it was military so i go back in the house to get my night vision bie to see if i could see if it was a police or military copter it was big and losd at that time i was looking at the helicopter i see 3 or 4 objects about 2 to 5 miles away going west 3 objects were moving and one behind it going up and down but you could not see it with your naked eyes only with the night vision and i thought strange the helicopter was looking for something to kept moving around in circles over heilbronn the objects were over by wartenberg mountiana few miles away about 1200 to 5000 feet this went on for about over a half an hour with the strange helicopter flying around the lights that i saw were going west torwards stuttgart.You could not see these objects with your eyes the first 3 objects were above each other and 1 behind them and were moving up and down too!.They wernt stars that i now for sure!!!!..The copter i think was black no lights:oh there was another strange thing about the lights too there were these beams of light that were like search lights that were shooting up into the sky a few of them right around the strange lights but agian you could not see the lights with your naked eyes only with night vision!.Real weird don,t know if the lights were coming from the objects or search lights....By the way i look for ufos all the time.I,ve seen many ufos in my life and was maybe abducted in the 70s.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 3 to 4 glowing objects in sky

content.detailedDescription:
At 16:45 on 25 may 2012 i was sitting in my backyard with my dog. i was in a chair that faced the direction of about 180-185 degrees. i happened to look up to see an aircraft i heard. i saw the airliner- on a course of about 350 degrees, around 3000 feet agl, to my west.  
i also noticed a very dark, solid appearing object at about 85 degrees above the horizon. it was moving "slowly" in a northeasterly direction. it made no sound that i was aware of. it appeared to be a "flattened circle" in shape and was seemingly "turning end over end". it had a very definite, sharply defined shape. it reminded me of what i would imagine a lp record would look like in the air, but it had a definite "thickness". (i know, a circle has no "ends", but that is the best way to describe the movement). as it "flipped over" and seemed to "wobble", it reflected the sun light. it did not appear to be a bird, nor did it appear to be an aircraft. it had an apparent speed of about that of a soaring bird, but seemed to be higher than i have noticed birds flying in this area. it struck me as being solid, and "metallic", but that is just my opinion. as i have no idea of the altitude, i have no idea of the size, but it appeared to me to be between the size of jupiter and the size of an aspirin at arm's length. it was under the very broken clouds.
after about 15 seconds of uninterrupted observation (by now it was just past my apparent 90 degree point heading to the ne it seemed to disappear. what was odd was that the sky where i last saw it seemed to "shimmer" for a brief moment.
i had been outside for about 15 minutes; and am in relatively good health. i have spent years as an amateur "skywatcher" with binoculars and telescope.  i do have to admit this is the first thing seen in the air in my 61 years of life that i have not been able to explain. at first i thought it was  kite, or perhaps a balloon, but it did not seem to move like either.
content.summary: Dark, reflective circular object that "disappeared" after about 15 seconds of observation.

content.detailedDescription:
It was winter and i was with my mom and dad at our grandparents house.
it was already dark outside and i was staring out the window, watching the fields behind their home and the city lights on the horizon.

all of a sudden i saw an object hovering behind one of neighbours' trees. 

the tree is approximately 4 meters (about 12 feet i guess) away from the window and about 4-5 meters high (ca. 12-15 feet), but the object appeared much farther away (the object seemed to be about 300-500 meters away). still the object was at tree level, so must have been hovering pretty close the ground.

at first i only saw three lights, positioned in a triangle shape. they were red, blue and green and they changed colours in a random way, but there were never two lights which had the same colour at any given time. 

so at first i thought it was the reflection of something in the house (like those small 'party lights' you can buy at the kids store), but when i looked behind me i couldn't see anything projecting such lights.

i looked outside again and i couldn't really figure out the shape of the object, but because we live in an area that has a lot of light pollution (which makes the sky look brighter), i could now at least tell that it was an object and not just lights, because i saw a silhouet that appeared darker than the nightsky.

it hovered a little longer and all of a sudden it flew away at an amazingly fast speed, right into the sky and disappeared.

i the whole event took about 2-3 minutes.

i was kind of intrigued at first and kept staring outside to see if i could spot it again. when i couldn't find it, i asked my family, who were standing a bit further away, if they saw it too, but they didn't...

i didn't really bring it up ever again, but besides from the exact date (because it has been 7 years) i remember the experience quite vividly, which i find a bit strange.
content.summary: Object with 3 lights changing from red, blue and green randomly hovering and then warp off into sky

content.detailedDescription:
Mexico, missouri
5/24/2012: overcast night, stars only slightly visible. 
i was looking for stars through the hazy atmosphere when the following events occured.
9:20-what appeared to be a star moved erratically (north, south, east, and west pausing and changing direction, also moving in concentric circles and arced paths at times.  watched for approximately 30 min.
9:50 two dim orange lights on what appeared to be the underbelly of a rounded triangular craft shot off to the north and slightly west in a trailing pattern.  almost as if gliding but very quickly.  no sound at all.
10:15-my wife and i both saw what appeared to be a bright white trailing shooting star coming from the west/south west that paused moved very erratically and then continued in its flight path towards the east/north east.
10:20-i saw a fourth light, reddish in nature, stream in from the north headed south pause and behave much the same way as the first light in roughly the same location first spotted.  watched for approximately 5 minutes before i lost sight of it, as the reddish hue was harder to detect with cloud cover starting to increase.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Four very different crafts of some type demonstrating various phenomena

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving back to my house on a main road of our town. he was actually first to spot this and quickly as i looked to our right i spotted it too. it was a bright blue light that was floating in mid air above the road we looked down. street lights we on in the vicinity and we saw nothing that could explain this or that was connected to the light. we drove past as the light didnt flicker or fludder, we quickly went back to check on what it was, but when we returned the light was gone.
content.summary: Strong floating blue light

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were sitting on lawn chairs at approximately 920pm on wednesday may 23rd, 2012 in the back yard by the back fence line. we were talking about the spirit plane being just about 3ft off the ground. then we saw it, the falling green circular light. 

there is a field that starts about 30ft directly behind the fence and then further back at the edge of the field there is a small river surrounded by a treeline that is approximately 1,000 feet back from our fence. there are some trees to each side of the back fence to the north and south just behind the backyard fence. the trees were approximately 25ft (diagonal) from us on either side. the trees are about 40ft to 60ft tall. we were facing east.

out of nowhere a green circular light (in between kelly green and lime green color) approximately 75-80ft above us and 25ft from where we were sitting, it appeared to be just a little smaller then the size of a soccer ball and came down at an angle and disappeared behind the top of the tree to the north. it did not illuminate the area around it and the only illumination was the circle object itself. however on each side of the circle there were two very small tails of light as it fell that were red/green fade. none of it lit the sky around it which made it even really more perplexing. no in between color it appeared as red directly on top of green.  there was absolutely no noise at all. it was really close to our proximity. 

i wish i could draw the shape for you on this page that accurately shows the side small red/green trail. i tried with paint program but its too inaccurate. it wasn't scary it was more like did we really just see that???? and what the heck was it?? why didn't it make noise? and why did it just disappear at the top of the tree? shouldn't we have seen it below the bottom limbs of the tree in the field? if it was a meteor wouldn't it have made some sound if it did hit the ground in the field?
content.summary: A illuminated circular green light in the clear sky falling at an angle and absolutely no noise disappeared in single tree top.

content.detailedDescription: It rained very hard and i took our german shep out and i saw the rainbow so i went in got the camera and came out and took some pics and when we were ther we saw this thing come out of no where and went straight up some n then it turned and it has a tail like a comet but then it went a little to the right and then back and then the clouds got in the way and i have a pic of it ther moving up and then in the clouds ,, it took me years to find this pic due to i just had my knee replaced and i was recouping , but very cool pics ,,, i have pics of this orb ,,the same sizes that appears in diff pics ,,,im happy to send this to yous now that i found them ,,i cant seem to down load them to you ,, but if you are interested ..Let me know and i will work on it ,,,thanks again ,,
content.summary: I went out to take a pic of the double rainbow

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at a red light when i first noticed three lights coming directly towards me. the road i was on was soon to be curving towards the left as it goes around a very small hill, just above the hill is where the lights became visible. because of the hill being in the way, only one of the lights was visible at first, at that point i wasn't paying much attention to it, just figured it was one of the helicopters that seem to be constantly around and typical of this los angeles suburb. the single light was very low in altitude, seemingly just low enough to clear the height of the hill by a couple hundred feet, again nothing out of the ordinary for the helicopters around here. but then two additional lights became visible as they got close enough that the hill was no longer blocking them. it was easy to see that all three lights were at the same altitude and moving at the same exact speed. when there was only one light visible, i didn't think much about it, but as soon as three identical lights showed up, that got my full attention real fast. something was definitely different about the whole scene, the most obvious being that i've never before nor since seen three helicopters flying in formation such as this, basically side by side and awefully close together. but also was strange how all three lights were at exactly the same altitude, moving at exactly the same speed, and so evenly spaced. as the lights got a little closer i could see that the one in the middle was slightly ahead of the other two, like a boomerang shape except not so curved, more straightened out and not so curved like a typical boomerang is. at this point i was still thinking how odd it all seemed and then the light was green and i had to go. i went just as slowly as i could and was sticking my head out the window trying to get a look as i was driving. like i said before, they were coming directly at me when at the red light, they were going to be passing directly overhead. this was not so easy to do, to drive down a road which was soon to be curving, and at the same time to be looking straight up at my zenith. i almost was about to pull off the road but didn't. besides looking straight up at the lights, which by the way didn't look any different than when they were visible through my windsheild and coming straight at me, i did realize one thing by sticking my head out the window, that being that there was absolutely no sound whatsoever. that's when it struck me that what i had just seen was really weird, that a helicopter or even a small plane could have passed directly overhead at such an incredibly low altitude without making a sound was impossible, whatever it was it was just to low for it to have not made any sound whatsoever. i guess the only other thing i can think of is that maybe it was some sort of glider, yet this seems as fantastic a conclusion as it being extraterrestrial, i just can't beleive a glider would be flying around at night like that at hilltop level in a residential area, and besides that a gigantic glider to boot. i estimate the distance between the two outside lights to be approximately 1,000 feet. this thing was big and quiet and i was very impressed by what i had seen. it was many years later that i saw shows about ufo's which had the same boomerang type crafts as i had seen, in other words, corroborating my sighting, and interestingly enough, those boomerang type sightings were also contemporaneous. also the size of my sighting seems to easily match the size of the other ones, so it seems that i,ve seen exactly the same craft as other people. not sure if my finally getting around to reporting this incident will make any difference, maybe it can mean something that it expands the geographic area for sightings of this type of craft.
content.summary: Big boomerang shaped, silent craft

content.detailedDescription: Almost every clear night for the last 3 to 4 weeks i've seen an object to the north of my house that stays in the same spot for hours. i go outside every 2 or 3 hours to smoke a cigarette and always look up at the sky. when i saw it the first time a few weeks ago, i just thought it was a plane. but every night, usually around 11 pm - 1 am, i'd go outside and the object would be in the same spot. i've gotten binoculars out and looked, and the object has red and green or blue lights that flash (not at the same time).  i never lose sight of the object, it is always in the same area when i go out to smoke. eventually i just go to bed.  then i saw on the kc news tonight someone had video and it was the same exact thing i've been seeing. i'm about a 4 hour drive away from there.
content.summary: A stationary object with blinking red and green/blue lights

content.detailedDescription: I was spending the week at my brother's house in sealy about 50 miles west of houston, we were designing and building a fruit and vegetable garden for his yard during the day. it was about 11pm and i had went outside to smoke a cigarette and look at the stars because i don't get that view of the night sky in the city. i looked north towards i-10 and up about 60 degrees looking at the constellations in the sky one of which had a very bright star like object just below it. at first glance i thought it was a star but it seemed "off" in a way. after about a minute of staring at it i realized it was not a star so i pulled out my camera phone and to my dismay the battery was dead. i stared at the object for another 30 seconds when it seemed to grow bigger and get brighter, it grew to about twice it's previous size and then flashed out of view and was gone. i stared at the empty spot for about 5 - 10 seconds trying to contemplate what i just saw when out from the south were two f-16 fighter jets with full afterburners on racing towards the spot where the light had been then made a very wide 180 degree turn back to the south where they disappeared behind the tree line. in retrospect i would say the jets where around 30 - 40 thousand feet high and i would put the object at about the same altitude.
content.summary: Star like object seen over sealy tx.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on our back deck, my daughter and i observed 2 lights parallel to each other flying at a low altitude at a very slow rate of speed. they were flying nw to se. both object stayed perfectly parallel to each other the whole flight. they blinked with perfect precision. this went on for 6 minutes and then the lights began to circle around one another. the color of the lights was a bright bright white, almost blue white and they were spherical shaped. someone please, please tell me what this besides a ufo. i'm literally in shock and my daughter is also. we had to come inside at one point because we noticed the lights had stopped and were circling one another and this scared my daughter pretty badly. they circled side to side, over and around, under and over, very quickly but in sync together. you never think that you'll see something like this and every thought that runs through your head ranges from plane jumpers to balloons...This was neither!!!! the objects made no sound.
content.summary: Craft moving simultaneously

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on our back deck, my daughter and i observed 2 lights parallel to each other flying at a low altitude at a very slow rate of speed. they were flying nw to se. both object stayed perfectly parallel to each other the whole flight. they blinked with perfect precision. this went on for 6 minutes and then the lights began to circle around one another. the color of the lights was a bright bright white, almost blue white and they were spherical shaped. someone please, please tell me what this besides a ufo. i'm literally in shock and my daughter is also. we had to come inside at one point because we noticed the lights had stopped and were circling one another and this scared my daughter pretty badly. they circled side to side, over and around, under and over, very quickly but in sync together. you never think that you'll see something like this and every thought that runs through your head ranges from plane jumpers to balloons...This was neither!!!! the objects made no sound.
content.summary: Craft moving simultaneously

content.detailedDescription:
Extremely bright orange object emerged from cloud front 1 hour after sunset.  at first i thought it might be military flare but it was moving at constant speed and altitude and then suddenly changed direction 90 degrees to orginal flight path and then suddenly sped away into cloud cover at very high rate of speed.  much brighter than either an aircraft landing light or a typical military flare, both of which i am quite familiar with.  it disappeared into the cloud front and then suddenly the light went out.

i've lived here for 12 years and i've seen lots of military flares and aircraft landing lights, but i have never seen anything even remotely like this.  it was not an aircraft landing light, flare, or anything like that.
content.summary: Extemely bright orange object emerging from cloud front at high rate of speed and then abruptly changing direction 90 degrees to orgininal fliight path.

content.detailedDescription:
Extremely bright orange object emerged from cloud front 1 hour after sunset.  at first i thought it might be military flare but it was moving at constant speed and altitude and then suddenly changed direction 90 degrees to orginal flight path and then suddenly sped away into cloud cover at very high rate of speed.  much brighter than either an aircraft landing light or a typical military flare, both of which i am quite familiar with.  it disappeared into the cloud front and then suddenly the light went out.

i've lived here for 12 years and i've seen lots of military flares and aircraft landing lights, but i have never seen anything even remotely like this.  it was not an aircraft landing light, flare, or anything like that.
content.summary: Extemely bright orange object emerging from cloud front at high rate of speed and then abruptly changing direction 90 degrees to orgininal fliight path.

content.detailedDescription: I'm not sure what it is, but i have it on 8mm film. i just found the old film yesterday while cleaning my garage. it's a huge round object completely on fire falling from sky at high altitude. i'm guessing it would have hit the in nevada mountains unless it made it over the mountains. i have very good 30 seconds or so footage with some zoom in close up.. i don't know how to put the video on my laptop but i can hook the camcorder up to my tv..
content.summary: Filmed very large metalic object on fire falling from sky

content.detailedDescription: Standing on deck of house south side just got dark flashing orange and reddish light coming towards us me and my son tyler goes by towards the north starts getting dimmer within 2 seconds it dissapeared and within 5 seconds reappears to the south again does this about 10 times once it did a circle before before it dissapeared
content.summary: Watched for about 7 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the balcony of my apartment, with my visiting relative from indiana, when he noticed an object low in the western sky .  it was due west.  i have seen similar things before but were unable to get a really good look at it with the binoculars i have.  we have been admiring the clear moon images the last few nights.  he noticed the object and pointed out that it was displaying many colors.  i used the railing to stabilize the binoculars and got a really good look at it.  it was indeed displaying different colors that were not faa identifiers.  just as in the past, this object appeared to be stationary but my recollections in the past have been that it gets lower in the sky as the night progresses.  it is still visible.  he will be up late so he will continue to observe.  it is now 10:43 pm.
content.summary: Multi-colored lights in western night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the balcony of my apartment, with my visiting relative from indiana, when he noticed an object low in the western sky .  it was due west.  i have seen similar things before but were unable to get a really good look at it with the binoculars i have.  we have been admiring the clear moon images the last few nights.  he noticed the object and pointed out that it was displaying many colors.  i used the railing to stabilize the binoculars and got a really good look at it.  it was indeed displaying different colors that were not faa identifiers.  just as in the past, this object appeared to be stationary but my recollections in the past have been that it gets lower in the sky as the night progresses.  it is still visible.  he will be up late so he will continue to observe.  it is now 10:43 pm.
content.summary: Multi-colored lights in western night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving a semi-truck northbound on ih-35 about 40-50 miles of san antonio,tx. in the sky above me i saw what i thought was lightening illuminating a section of the sky and i looked up and saw what looked to be a straight line of brilliant white light shoot across a section of sky. my immediate impression was that it was an meteorite or something burning up as it came closer to the earth. however, it was the same color and appearance as a bolt of lightening, and simply shot straight across the sky for maybe 2 seconds before ending. it left an afterimage in the sky very similar to a lightening strike, but there was no thunder. it lit up the few clouds in the sky which is what caused me to look up and wonder if it was lightening, and that's when the streak of light appeared. it was almost like a laser beam that lasted 2 seconds. i've seen shooting stars before and this looked nothing like that. it went straight across the sky and was as bright as lightening. it has left me curious as to what it might have been. i'm sure other drivers saw it as well.
content.summary: Looked like lightening but a straight line

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was watching a satellite move across the sky from the west to east while finishing cooking on the grill. we���ve spent many a night satellite watching over the years so it is second nature to peer upwards any chance we get.  she called me outside to see a different object in the sky. it had a definite disc shaped and appeared to be on fire. it was moving from the south to north approximately 90 degrees above horizon at highest point. color was a very bright orange and it did appear to be on fire. it moved at a constant speed, no wavering, and at a pretty good rate. sky was clear. altitude undetermined, but if i had to guess i would say 3,000 to 5,000 feet if not higher. size of object was about the size of a 737 at that altitude, but again object was disc shaped. i have an aviation background and i immediately looked for but did not see a contrail, no noise, no strobe or recognition lights. no glowing, or trailing debris, or smoke trail like you would see with a meteor or boloid. no sign of a balloon attached, like one of those party balloons that are sent aloft via a candle. 
this was no candle and balloon. object was way too bright, too big, and moving too fast for wind conditions, which were calm to light out of the south east. it appeared to be on fire because of it���s color and the way it looked around the edges, changing in shape ever so slightly like a flickering flame, but the brightness and intensity were constant throughout the object and never dimmed the entire time in view. duration of sighting was approximately 7 to 10 seconds. did not have horizon to horizon view of object due to trees and houses, only about 60 degrees of it���s travel was observable if object indeed went horizon to horizon.
i saw a similar object last summer and sent in a report at that time.
content.summary: Bright orange fireball like disc seen over rockford, il- not a chinese lantern!

content.detailedDescription:
City of maricopa, az

at approximately 7:55 pm of may 23rd 2012, local arizona time, driving back home from the local wal-mart,  i noticed 2 flying red balls/globes flying 100 to 150 feet above my residential subdivision of glenn wylde just 1 block away from my residence . as i noticed the 2 flying globes, i pulled over immediately, got out of my car and observed this event in more detail. the flying red globes made a 90 degree turn from southeast heading to a northeast at approximately 25 to 30 miles per hour flight speed at a complete silence. they were probably as big as a large car and i noticed that their flight was at a controlled manner due to the fact that the second globe was following the first with the same distance all the time. i witnessed this event for approximately 30 to 45 seconds.  i snapped a picture of one of the flying globes with my phone���s camera.
after that i got back in my car and drove about 100 feet around the corner to get to my residence���s street when i noticed another red flying globe, but this time they were 3 red flying balls/globes with the same path as the other 2, heading northeast, approximately 100 to 150 feet above the ground at the same speed as the other earlier 2 red globes, same size at a complete silence like the other 2. i pulled over immediately, got out of my car and recorded a video of the event.  i then drove to my residence and pulled in my driveway. i proceeded to my house to tell my wife what i have witnessed and recorded,  then i proceeded back out front to get the groceries out of my car and i noticed another flying red globe, same size, flying slowly 100 to 150 feet above ground and  heading  the same northeast path  as the previous 5 red globes. i rushed into my house to tell my wife and we ran through my house to get to my backyard. we got outside and both of us witnessed this red flying globe at a very slow control flight over my backyard heading the same direction as the previous 5.
content.summary: 6 flying red globes flying over my residencial subdivision

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Orange orb of light in the sky

2010 sept 25 at 12:50-12:55 am

at bc north vancouver deep cove boat launch dock

group of friends 4 people total.

we were faceing west towards downtown vancouver


we saw an orange orb of light at our location it was north west of us looked like 5-15 nm from us 

it was dark and the light was strong so it was hard to determind its distance.

2 of the witness is a pilot

there was no red or green light. no strobe lights

because the intensity of the lights is not what we are used to seeing when flying it was hard to determind the distance from us

the light in the sky looked brighter then the street lamp that was less then a parking lot  from us

the light from the sky was not a focus light "not a spot light" was a all directional light

the light made no sounds it was traveling steady from nort west of us to south west of us

the object was slowing down to a dead stop which i would say its was above us

i dont remembering the lights dimming it seems to me the lights stayed the same brightness as it came to a stop 

which was closest to us at the time. it made no noise.

it then hover for 10-20 sec

the wind was blowing north east.

taf/metars

cyvr 251000z 10007kt 15sm few055 bkn076 ovc094 15/12 a3005 rmk sc2ac5ac2 slp177

it then went upwards for around 3-5 sec 

untill it reached the overcast layer

it was fast when i frist saw it. i would say it was almost as fast as an f-16 intercepting at the winter olympics

but it had no sound

one of my friend took a photo of it but it did not turn out good at all the lights in photo was blue.

i was planing to report this to transport canada and phone up the cvyr tower. but did not do so.

it was one of my friend who pointed to the sky telling us to look. my frist  reaction to the object was it was a search helicopter. or something but 2 sec later my view totally changed. 

my personal view is that rotation, gravitation, electromagnetic, weak nuclear force. could be the power source of this craft and i think its made in earth.

i never thought i will see a ufo in my life and i never did belived in them. i always thought most ufo seen in history is just airforce spy planes or prototypes. and i hope within my life time the ufo that i had seen will be disclosed to public as a project or prototype in the future. 

digital photo is not in my possession the other witness has it. but i've seen it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange orb level flight change to vertical flight

content.detailedDescription: Standing out in our driveway the evening of may 18, 2012.  three adults witnessed what we first thought to be a bright planet.  it started out in the eastern sky, moving straight to the west - the same flight path airplanes take from the airport (cmh).  as quickly as we noticed it and thought it was a planet, we noticed it moving.  the only thing any of us have ever seen move as fast as this was, were fighter jets.  this had no blinking or colored lights.  just one solid bright white light, (assuming) like a headlight.  there was no sound from it as it passed our home, just to the south of us.  once it got a little west of our home, possibly over i71 south, it either increased in altitude and went into clouds or it just disappeared.  no one recorded the episode, as we all stood there just watching it, wondering what it was.
content.summary: Silent, bright solid white light in the sky, moving faster than airplanes/helicopters normally seen in area.

content.detailedDescription: I was videotaping jupiter in the morning when a light passed by in a straight line, too fast for a satellite and a high enough magnitude to be seen with a video camera
content.summary: I was videotaping jupiter in the morning when a light passed by quickly, too fast for the iss or a satellite, high magnitude to be captured with a video camera

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work at 9:30pm on tuesday night 05-15-12. when i pulled out of my driveway and onto the state road and drove about 1/2  mile i noticed 3 bright white lights about 2 miles straight ahead. i live in the country and at this time i'm driving on a paved road. where i see the lights is where the paved road curves to the right but a gravel road goes straight ahead. as i get close to this gravel road, these lights are getting brighter and brighter. i'm wondering to myself "when did they put up a tower down this road?" and the closer i get the brighter these lights are so then i'm thinking to myself, "man, the people who live down this road are gonna be mad about these bright lights on this tower!" i pulled out my cell phone camera to try to catch a picture but with the lights flashing and the delay on my camera i kept missing the shot plus i didn't want to be late for work. i really wasn't thinking ufo at this time but as i kept on driving around several more curves i kept seeing these lights flash for several more miles and then i was out of range. i thought about these lights all night at work. the next night,wednesday 05-16-12, i looked for this "tower" but it wasn't there. this is when i thought it might have been a ufo. when i got off work at 7am on thursday morning i drove down this gravel road to see if i could see any signs of a tower or any farm equipment that could have made these lights. there was nothing. i haven't seen them since but i did post it on my facebook and one of my friends who lives about 10 miles or more from me said that she and her husband saw strange lights that night as well.
content.summary: 3 extremely bright lights straight up and down, flashing slowly. i thought it was a newly errected tower.

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a star but was color as sun with blue red and white lights scrolling around. also a bright light like	a spotlight. it was just hovering over. i got out of my card and it looked like it spot lighted me and looked as it was coming toward me so i ran back to my car and turned to look at it and it was still in same spot. it has been there for three nights that i know of.
content.summary: Looked like a star but was color as sun with blue red and white ligst scrolling around. also a bright light like	a spotlight. it was just hovering over.

content.detailedDescription: It looked like a shooting star then dimmed to like a satellite would look two diffrent times two diffrent weeks, same time of night, same place in the sky.
content.summary: I witnessed on two seprate occasions the same thing the second time my girlfriend witnessed it also.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work on route 84 westbound.  past exit 5 and heading towards exit 4. aprox 13 mile stretch of country. started seeing 3 extremely bright white lights in sky.  thought it was a plane heading into nearby stewart airport for a landing.  been traveling this same stretch of road for 9 years now at this time of night and am familiar with the airplanes at night.  but this wasn't acting like an ordinary airplane. it struck me odd, it was fairly low and appeared to be hovering. it looked so odd.
  i was driving 65 mph and kept getting closer to the bright lights.  then i did see some faint red lights and reassured myself that it had to be a plane.  kept driving closer to it until i passed right by it.  it was on my right, just on the other side of the eastbound lanes.  it was not moving. it was indeed hovering.  difficult to drive, because i just kept looking at it, so i slowed down. 
  it was just hanging there. a triangle shape with 3 very bright lights at the corners and a little red light near each big white light.  don't think it was huge as it seemed really close, hovering just above the tree line. never seen any kind of craft just hover in one place in the sky.  became afraid and drove very fast home.
content.summary: Triangle ctaft hovering next to interstate highway at night

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving northbound on rt. 61, about 10 miles south of blue grass, ia. in the northeast sky, i saw a bright whitish light, rather large in size. there was almost a greenish tinge to a ring around the object.  as soon as i saw it, i asked my husband if he saw it and he did.  we only saw it for a few seconds and it made a downward arc and disappeared.

 i had no idea what it was. i'm hoping someone else saw it and has an explanation.  i only saw it because it was so bright.  it could not have been a plane, it was too bright, too big and moved too quickly in a downward arc to be a plane.  there were also no light towers in the area, outside a red light in the north west sky that did not go off / flash/ blink at all.
content.summary: Driving. saw bright white light with green edge floating, then made a sharp arc downward, disappeared.
